template <dimension_type Dim, typename Block>
struct vsip::impl::Rt_block_copy_to_ptr
File: ../../../vsip/core/block_copy.hpp

Utility classes to copy block data to/from a pointer to regular memory, with layout determined at run-time.

Template parameters:
Dim:is the dimension of the run-time layout,
Block:is a block type.
